text:
Company: Hamilton PLC

Role: CEO / Product Owner / Founder

Job Type: Executive Leadership

Job Description:
As the CEO / Product Owner / Founder, you will be responsible for driving the vision and strategy of Hamilton PLC. You will oversee the development of our products, ensuring they meet the highest standards of quality and innovation. Your leadership will inspire and motivate our cross-functional teams to achieve exceptional results.

Responsibilities:
- Develop and execute the company's vision and strategy
- Oversee product development, ensuring quality and innovation
- Lead and motivate cross-functional teams
- Foster a culture of diversity, equity, and inclusion
- Collaborate with stakeholders to drive business growth

Qualifications:
- Advanced level of Spanish proficiency
- Proven experience in product development and leadership
- Strong communication and interpersonal skills
- Ability to work in a fast-paced environment
- Fluent in English

Benefits:
- Competitive salary and benefits package
- Opportunities for professional growth and development
- Collaborative and dynamic work environment
- Recognition and rewards for outstanding performance
